activities:
Analogic Corporation wants to be able to run complete headcount reports of all of its subsidiaries. These reports are typical Human Resource Reports like Organizational Charts, New Hires, Terminations, Promotions, etc. The data activities are strictly for internal reporting purposes only and no customer information will be collected.
 
Data transmission: information is current sent through our secured server, via email and will be maintained in the Corporate HR employee database.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
